```{r}

b<-3.3
```

1.b



Question #3

```{r}
queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")
```

3.a
```{r}
queue <- c(queue, 'serpent')
print(queue)
```
3.b
```{r}
queue <- queue[-1]
print(queue)
```
3.c
```{r}
queue <- c('donkey', queue[1:4])
print(queue)
```
3.d
```{r}
queue <- queue[-5]
print(queue)
```

3.e
```{r}
queue <- append(queue, "aphid", after=3)
print(queue)
```
3.f
```{r}
which(queue=="aphid")
```
